nextSession.title: Chapter 46 - In Rahadin's Wake
nextSession.description: After scaling the castle walls, the group descended a long winding staircase and found themselves in Rahadin's office. After a difficult battle, the group managed to kill Rahadin, ready to descend a secret staircase in the back of his office.

events.value: Firewatch's nightmares from the Mystery Mine will fade.
Florian, Cassandra, and Cloud's boon expire.

nextSession.title: Chapter 18 - Saving Sir Talavar
nextSession.description: After entering Hither, the group promised to help Sir Talavar escape his cage by bringing him to Jingle Jangle on Telemy Hill and finding a key to free him.
